input_email_body:
Subject: Issues with Project Timelines Not Updating Correctly

Hello Customer Support, I am facing problems with project timelines not updating You can reach me at omar.hassan@secure.net.. It appears there might be a database sync issue. Despite restarting the application server, the problem remains unresolved. I would be grateful if you could examine this and offer a resolution at your earliest convenience. Please inform me if you require any further details from me to address this issue. Thank you for your time and assistance. I look forward to your prompt response. My name is Elena Ivanova.
